text: The Killers Are Our Guests (originally titled Gli assassini sono nostri ospiti) is a 1974 Italian crime thriller movie directed by Vincenzo Rigo and starring Anthony Steffen, Margaret Lee, Luigi Pistilli, Gianni Dei. ==Other websites== * ==References== Category:1974 crime thriller movies Category:Italian crime movies Category:Italian thriller movies
title: The Killers Are Our Guests
